rooms.description: Provides an airy, welcoming space with natural lighting and ventilation. Features local sustainable materials such as bamboo or recycled wood flooring.

A spacious open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. Incorporates eco-friendly fixtures, energy-efficient windows and sustainable building materials. Positioned in a southeast direction to harness morning sunlight.

Modern open-plan kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, recycled countertops, and ventilation designed for optimal airflow. Adjacent to the living area to encourage social interaction while cooking.
Water-saving fixtures are integrated with natural lighting. Located near a water source to ensure proper drainage, following Vastu recommendations.
Spacious master bedroom oriented towards the north or east for optimum energy flow and sunlight. Uses eco-friendly insulation materials and natural ventilation strategies.

openings.description: Large entryway door with sustainable wood finish and energy-efficient glass panel. Designed to minimize heat gain while enhancing natural lighting.
Energy efficient windows placed to enhance cross ventilation and maximize daylight in the living area.
Strategically positioned for optimal Vastu alignment with east or north exposure.

design_principles.eco_friendly: Uses locally-sourced, sustainable materials and energy-efficient installations.
design_principles.vastu_compliance: Rooms are oriented according to Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow and optimal sunlight exposure.
